Dialogue.Value: Have a nice day.
Hm? This is no place for,kids to be playing around.
Actually，we came to see dad.
You’re Dr. Morichika’s,daughter?
You came at a good time.,Something interesting just,arrived.
Something interesting?
Well，it was de-light-ful to see,you! Fufu! Take care!
What a mature lady!
That was Yukari Yakumo，the,president of ”Border Concern”.
Ain’t Border Concern that,super-huge conglomerate!?
Isn’t it that company based in,Central City?,Their slogan is....
”From the cradle to the new,age.”,Ugh，how annoying.
You know ’em well，huh?
It’s one of my family’s rival,companies.
Father Vlad always used to,tell us to ”know thine enemy”.
Wow! Of course the lady of a,renowned family would be one,step ahead!
Hmph. Flattery is more than,welcome，but let’s not dawdle.
I simply must find out what’s,so interesting to her.
Alright，alright!,In we go!
The elevator opened!,Go to the first floor?
The elevator opened!,Go to which floor?
”Office” is written on the door.,I have no reason to go in here.
It’s a vending machine.
The paint is starting to chip.,I can tell it’s been here for,years.
Since it’s an old model，it,doesn’t have a jack in port.
It’s a bench to rest on.
It feels oddly stiff.,I don’t think I could sit on it,for very long.
I heard Dr. Morichika’s wife is,a researcher at Hearn College,in Eurica.
Even though they live apart，,he’s a loving husband and the,family gets along pretty well.
Dr. Morichika got caught up,in the ROM incident and was,taken to the hospital....
But he bounced back after only,one day! Top-class scientists,are pretty resilient，huh....?
ROM sure did a number on,the University’s reputation....
Should we get the NetAgents,to do patrols....?,Grumble Grumble....
Man.... If I didn’t have my,thesis due，I could enter the,N1 League....
In the past，theses had to be,hand-written. You couldn’t use,a computer.
Students today have it so,much easier.
A NetAgent girl just stormed,into that room....
In the past，theses had to be,hand-written. You couldn’t use,a computer.
Students today have it so,much easier.
We’re gonna do NetBattling,drills all day today!!
We’re the University’s,NetBattling club.
It’s been like this every single,day since the head of the club,lost in the N1 League.
Why not scout Yamame?,You know，that girl from,Dr. Morichika’s lab?
It looks like she’s been,getting a lot better at,NetBattling lately....
I’m part of the NetBattling Club，,but....
Recently President Usami’s,been busy going to meet with,some Hearn girl.
Aaah!,What’s going to happen to the,NetBattling Club?!
Hearn.... I heard that girl just,became the president of some,big company.
It’s gotta be tough dealing with,college while running a,company as president.
